title: Vayne Splash art and texture update?
body: Do you guys think there will be an update soon for the splash are and texture for some of the more vintage skins for Vayne. Specifically the Aristocrat and Vindicator skins.

replies.body: Can't say I know anything first hand, the best place for that kind of news would either be the [**general news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) or the [**Story, Art, & Sound**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art) board!
